00599     std::vector<std::string> getSubTopicsEntries(const std::string& subtopic) const {
00600         if (mySubTopicEntries.count(subtopic) > 0) {
00601             return mySubTopicEntries.find(subtopic)->second;
00602         } else {
00603             return std::vector<std::string>();
00604         }
00605     }
